review: Just a very simple and eloquent solution to steaming Netflix and Google Play products. I wish it had a remote because it can 'de-sync' the app from the TV and make it difficult to pause but it's very cheap. I honestly don't have any major criticisms because even the remote would be something that I feel isn't there fault because of the price point.I would also mention that with advertisements for these video streaming sticks there's a lot of discussion about what apps are available but I don't think it's a really issue because there's a lot of overlap between like Netflix and Hulu. Then with other more more niche app offerings, you didn't have them before so you're not missing them.
